name: Upgrader - Endless Mode Demo v1.01
description:
The Endless Mode Demo of Upgrader showcases the arcade style shoot 'em up version of the game, with an increasing difficulty, score system, and infinite play space. In Endless Mode you're tasked with surviving as long as you can, racking up a higher and higher score while avoiding, or killing enemies and collecting helpful pickups.

The demo currently includes:

- 4 Weapons

      - Pistol, Shotgun, Grenade Launcher, Rocket Launcher

-4 Enemy types

     - Pistol, Shotgun, Rush, Bomb

- 3 Pickups

     - Health, Dash, Score     

- 2 Abilities

     - Dash, Burst

- Upgrade-able stats

     - Speed, Dash Speed, Dash Duration, Burst Damage, Burst Duration, Idle Score Multiplier

- Absolutely no secrets

     -Seriously, not a single secret.

Feel free to comment here or send some feedback in game to let me know what you think, or what you'd like to see implemented or changed. Also if you run into any bugs, of course.
